author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great.
review:
I remember this as being my first serious Technic set. I loved it, it even had two different functions! And it had back steering. The only flaw is that the connecting things tend to break off. Other than that, it's a really good set.

For some reason, I really liked the (less complicated, and with just one function) alternate model very much. I have built both models lots of times. And I liked the wheels :)

author: fhansson
title: Simple yet funny!
review: This front loader (not excavator?) is simple in design and parts but neverless boring. The operation of steering and scope is perfect. It can easily be rebuilt for other tasks such as fork lift or snow plow. A fun, simple and affordable set of classic Technic Lego!
